metadata.name: 𝕋𝕖𝕒𝕙𝕠𝕦𝕤𝕖 𝕚𝕟 𝕥𝕙𝕖 𝕊𝕜𝕪
metadata.description:
A rich perfume of tea pervades the fresh mountain air; thoughts are circling in the wind, and memories are playing. No matter how high the mountain, the spirit can scale it; the scenery before us is as large as our hearts. The magnificent landscape distracts time itself from its impassive march forward, and reveals the secrets of the past. It's not just the neon colours that are gorgeous, but also your wild and unrepentant youth.

2100x2625, mp4 
Animation created by Yu Cai, music by Kidd Gorgeous
